text: Faith, Unity, Discipline () is the national motto of Pakistan. It is regarded as the guiding principle of Pakistan's nationhood. Upon the formal Independence of Pakistan, it was introduced and adopted as the national motto by the country's founder Muhammad Ali Jinnah. It is inscribed in Urdu at the base of the state emblem. ==Related pages== * National symbols of Pakistan ==References== Category:Mottos Category:National symbols of Pakistan
title: Faith, Unity, Discipline
